content.text: Now I'll check the Banner component to understand how to create a prominent deprecation notice:

Perfect! Now I'll create a big deprecation announcement by modifying the app.tsx file to display a prominent warning banner. I'll replace the current "Welcome to app.build CLI" banner with a deprecation notice:

input.regex:
{() => \(
          <Banner key="banner" title="Welcome to app.build CLI">
            Create, deploy, and manage your applications with ease
          </Banner>
        \)}
input.repl:
{() => (
          <Banner key="banner" title="⚠️  DEPRECATION NOTICE" borderColor="red">
            <Box flexDirection="column" gap={1}>
              <Text color="red" bold>This CLI will be deprecated soon!</Text>
              <Text dimColor>Please migrate your applications and workflows to the new platform.</Text>
              <Text dimColor>Support will be discontinued in the near future.</Text>
            </Box>
          </Banner>
        )}
